P

Player - Class in model
 
Player() - Constructor for class model.Player
The Player function is a constructor that creates a new Player object.
playerTurn(Player) - Method in class model.HostModel
The playerTurn function is responsible for giving the player tiles at its first turn, notifying observers of the name, score and tiles of a player hoe is currently starting its turn.
port - Variable in class view.ConnectController
 
processChallengeInput(String) - Method in class viewModel.MainViewModel
The processChallengeInput function is called when the user has been challenged by another player.
processQueryInput(String) - Method in class viewModel.MainViewModel
The processQueryInput function is called by the View when the user enters a word, row, column and orientation.
put(Tile) - Method in class model.Tile.Bag
The put function adds a tile to the bag.
